availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Kelly (Gallatin County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Gallatin County, Kentucky, farmer. Switzerland County, Indiana, native. Son of Thomas D. Kelly and Eleanor Kelly. Married to Elizabeth A. McCandless Kelly in Gallatin County, Kentucky, on February 22, 1859. Attended school in Boone County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Gallatin County in 1859. Killed by William Ross in Gallatin County in July 6, 1859.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, District 2, p. 168B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Mortality Schedules, Kentucky, Gallatin County, p. 214.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994035, Gallatin County Marriages.
"Another Cold Blooded Murder," Louisville Daily Courier (Louisville, KY), July 9, 1859, p. 1.
KYR-0001-006-0024.
KYR-0001-006-0026.
